response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors. This product holds significant value to me, and I am eager to share its benefits with someone who will appreciate it as much as I do.

Considering the immense value this product offers to you, I propose a purchase price of $1,350,000. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I believe this offer strikes a balance that respects both our interests.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
